articles.author: Roy Luarca
articles.title: Wesley So hopes to make it 3 straight over Carlsen - Rappler
articles.description: World champion Magnus Carlsen and Filipino-American Wesley So arrange another title showdown in the seventh leg of the Champions Chess Tour
articles.content: So trounced world title challenger Ian Nepomniachtchi, 2-1, while Carlsen subdued Airthings Masters winner Teimour Radjabov, 3-1, in the second set of the semifinals to forge another title duel.
